rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with wheelchair accessible entry and Vastu-aligned positioning at the front center of the house.
A combined living and kitchen area with an open layout, natural light from large windows placed according to Vastu guidelines (east facing), designed for joint family interactions.
An adjacent dining area integrated into the open living area, providing additional seating and circulation space.
A bedroom for guests with wheelchair accessible layout. Positioned in accordance with Vastu principles (north-east corner).
A family toilet that is designed to be wheelchair accessible and placed in a convenient location according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Accessible ramped entrance for wheelchair users, complying with local norms and Vastu principles.
Secure exit door placed in accordance with structural design and Vastu guidelines.
